billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Creates the intellectual property asset management advisory council
summary: Creates the office of intellectual property asset management which authorizes an appointed chairperson to head an advisory council to establish policy; defines terms; requires reports to the governor and legislature.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating the intellectual property asset management advisory council; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
